name: Caterang
description:
In Caterang you wield a boomerang to defend your cat statue from incoming waves of enemies.

  • Throw your boomerang, then teleport to a new location to change its trajectory.
    • Destroying enemies refreshes your teleport.
  • Hit 3 or more enemies with a single throw to start charging your statue. 
    • When fully charged, hit your statue to charge your next attack with chain lighting.
  • Right-click to quickly recall your boomerang.

Originally created for Brains Eden 2019 by Fabian Groß, Ekaterina Kafelova, Gabriel Joyce, Tali Di Girolamo, and Peter Gatchev (Team Bacon Pancakes) and won Best Art.
